overview:
Hans Angermeier is the founder and CEO of CarCareKiosk and is responsible for the Company’s vision, strategic development and operations.

Before CarCareKiosk, Hans was an investment banker in New York City, most recently at BMO Capital Markets, and holds a BS in Finance and German from Indiana University (“IU”).

A natural leader and Eagle Scout, Hans was the President of the Mortar Board Honor Society at IU, which was the largest chapter in the country with approximately 90 members. In addition to his love for all things automotive, Hans is an avid sailor and surfer.

degrees.subject: Finance
degrees.institution: Indiana University - Kelley School of Business
